version_description:
Two more planes are available for flight:
Messerschmitt Me 262 - the world's first operational jet-powered fighter aircraft
Macchi C.202 - an italian fighter

Added language support for 4 more languages: Japanese, Chinese, Russian and Korean.

Fixed the start-up crash affecting some users and settings saving across devices.

Two more planes are available for flight:
Messerschmitt Me 262 - the world's first operational jet-powered fighter aircraft
Macchi C.202 - an italian fighter

Added language support for 4 more languages: Japanese, Chinese, Russian and Korean.

Fixed the start-up crash affecting some users and settings saving across devices.

Two more planes are available for flight:
Messerschmitt Me 262 - the world's first operational jet-powered fighter aircraft
Macchi C.202 - an italian fighter

Added language support for 4 more languages: Japanese, Chinese, Russian and Korean.

Fixed the start-up crash affecting some users and settings saving across devices.

- Added new planes: IAR80, Me209, HE162, LaGG3
- Added new campaign: Burning Skies
- Bug fixes
